column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A------ suspect was arrested by the Royal Gendarmerie after robbing and injuring foreigners along 178 Corner 13 in Chey Chumneas district
column5: at 02:00 AM on the 1st of May 2019.------The suspect
column6: a 19-year-old resident in Chaung Chamnar district
column8: was riding a motorbike when he snatched phones from two foreigners riding bicycles causing them to fall and suffer minor injuries.------The suspect was chased by Royal Gendarmes up to 178 and was nabbed  at the corner of 19th Street.------After the incident
column9: the Royal Gendarmerie of Daun Penh District sent the suspect to police to follow the legal procedures. ------TVFB
